content.text:
HON. J. FRENCH HILL

                              of arkansas

                    in the house of representatives

                       Tuesday, November 7, 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Mr. HILL. Mr. Speaker, I was absent from the House and missed votes 
on Tuesday, October 31, and Wednesday, November 1, due to a family 
commitment.
  Had I been present, I would have voted YEA on Roll Call No. 591; YEA 
on Roll Call No. 592; YEA on Roll Call No. 593; NAY on Roll Call No. 
594; NAY on Roll Call No. 595; YEA on Roll Call No. 596; NAY on Roll 
Call No. 597; YEA on Roll Call No. 598; and YEA on Roll Call No. 599.
content.speaker: Mr. HILL
